title: Biden will not travel with a delegation to Queen Elizabeth's funeral
Why GOP lawmaker says she opposed South Carolina near-total abortion ban
description: Republicans in South Carolina failed to pass a near-total abortion ban in the state. State Sen. Sandy Senn, one of two Republicans to oppose the measure, explained why.

title: Queen's former chef reveals which meal was higher pressure than state dinners
description: Queen Elizabeth II's former personal chef Darren McGrady shares some of his memories cooking for the royal family and reveals some of the Queen's favorite foods.

title: From werewolves to Jedi masters to secret wars, Disney just revealed a lot
description: Disney held its semiannual D23 event showcasing a variety of teasers, trailers, and casting announcements for new series and films. Fans can expect a lot from the Marvel and Star Wars franchises coming to Disney+.

title: President Zelensky speaks to CNN about Ukraine's counteroffensive against Russia
On the eastern front, a stunning week of Ukrainian success and Russian failures
description: The last week has seen a stunning transformation of the battlefield in eastern Ukraine, as a swift armored offensive by Ukrainian forces rolled through lines of Russian defenses and recaptured more than 3,000 square kilometers of territory.

title: Zelensky reveals Ukraine's main goal with counteroffensive
description: In an exclusive interview with CNN's Fareed Zakaria, Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky shares what he would tell former President Donald Trump about Russian President Vladimir Putin.

title: Watch: Zelensky speaks to CNN about Ukraine's counteroffensive against Russia
More than 40 settlements in the Kharkiv region liberated, says Ukrainian official
Chair of the Senate Intelligence Committee explains what's driving Ukraine's gains
description: Sen. Mark Warner (D-VA) says Ukraine is making great gains in its counteroffensive against Russia.

title: Hear how Hillary Clinton thinks DOJ should treat Trump
description: Hillary Clinton, who was investigated and cleared for her handling of classified information, discusses whether the Department of Justice should charge Former President Trump after law enforcement seized classified documents from his Mar-a-Lago residence.

title: Queen's coffin arrives at royal residence in Scottish capital, the first leg of her final journey
description: The Queen's coffin has arrived at the Palace of Holyroodhouse in Edinburgh, following a six-hour journey from Balmoral Castle to the Scottish capital.

title: Queen's corgis to live with the Duke and Duchess of York
description: Queen Elizabeth II's corgis will live with the Duke and Duchess of York, Andrew and Sarah, a source close to the Duke of York told CNN on Sunday.

title: Max Verstappen claims fifth-straight victory at Italian Grand Prix
description: Max Verstappen tightened his grip on the Formula One drivers' championship with victory ahead of Charles Leclerc at the Italian Grand Prix.

title: Emmys preview: Why 'Ted Lasso' will defend its crown, and 'The Crown' won't
description: "Succession," the 2020 Emmy winner for best drama series, will be a top contender at this year's ceremony on Sept. 12. But if you're wondering whether the HBO drama can beat last year's champion, Netflix's "The Crown," that matchup of TV's royal houses will have to wait.

title: Bear shows up at toddler's birthday party
description: A bear crashed a 2-year-old boy's birthday party and ate cupcakes. HLN's Susan Hendricks spoke to the boy and his family about the unexpected guest.

title: One thing Americans agree on? Our politicians are too old.
description: The President of the United States is 79 years old.

title: Border agency chief condemns retweets of 'offensive' comments by ex-Trump adviser from official CBP account
description: The head of US Customs and Border Protection on Saturday condemned several retweets from an official CBP regional Twitter account of "offensive" tweets made earlier that day by a former top adviser in the Trump administration.

title: Elon Musk's college sweetheart auctions off billionaire's mementos
description: Holding onto an ex's stuff may prove profitable later on, at least if your ex turns out to be the wealthiest man in the world.

title: Muslims are 25% of the world population. But in 200 shows researchers studied, they were just 1% of speaking characters
description: Despite making up one quarter of the world's population, Muslims are severely underrepresented on television -- and when they are represented, they're depicted as shallow stereotypes, according to a new study.

title: FBI file shows bureau kept tabs on Aretha Franklin's activism, a common focus during the Civil Rights era
description: There "ain't no way" the highest domestic law enforcement agency in the country was keeping tabs on Aretha Franklin -- but they were.

title: Biden to speak at 9/11 remembrance ceremony at Pentagon
description: President Joe Biden arrived at the Pentagon on Sunday morning, where he will speak at a 9/11 remembrance ceremony. He is also participating in a wreath-laying ceremony.

title: The Queen Elizabeth prophecy
description: In February 1952, King George VI was found dead in his sleep by a servant delivering his morning tea at the royal retreat at Sandringham. His 25-year-old daughter, Princess Elizabeth, became Queen even before she was able to rush home from a trip to Kenya.

title: Follow Queen Elizabeth's coffin as it begins final journey
description: CNN's Isa Soares breaks down the final journey of Queen Elizabeth's coffin as it is driven from Balmoral Castle and through Scottish towns so the public can pay their respects.

title: Queen Elizabeth II's state funeral: What to expect
The worst of inflation finally might be over
description: Is inflation really peaking? Are consumers growing more confident? We'll get those answers this week when the latest consumer and producer price indexes as well as retail sales figures for August all come out.

title: Queen's coffin begins journey through Scotland
Carlos Alcaraz and Casper Ruud both bidding for history in high-stakes US Open final
description: When Casper Ruud and Carlos Alcaraz meet in the US Open final, there won't just be a maiden grand slam title on the line, but a place at the top of the world rankings, too.

title: How South Korean kicker overcame a language barrier to thrive in the NFL
description: From not knowing any English to becoming a starter, Younghoe Koo is one of the most improbable National Football League success stories.

title: The NFL's most iconic theme music has roots in everything from Batman to 'Star Wars'
description: If you're a football fan, the first few blasts of an NFL broadcast theme can make you feel like running through a brick wall. It's superheroes! It's action! It's the entire percussion session wailing away for dear life! As the season descends upon us, enjoy a breakdown of the most iconic football themes you'll be hearing all autumn long. There are so many fascinating parallels and big names involved, you'll be the menace of every commercial break conversation.

title: Queen's coffin begins journey through Scotland
description: • Analysis: How the Queen's soft power has helped keep the United Kingdom together

title: Ukraine says Zaporizhzhia nuclear power plant has been shut down
Goalkeeper runs across pitch to help save fan's life
description: Barcelona's La Liga match against Cadiz on Saturday was temporarily halted with less than 10 minutes remaining after a fan suffered a cardiac arrest in the stands.

title: Why wireless carriers are able to give out iPhone 14s
description: The unveiling of the latest iPhone 14 lineup earlier this week has already spurred a flurry of new promotions from wireless giants including AT&T, T-Mobile and Verizon.

title: Ukraine says Zaporizhzhia nuclear power plant has been shut down
Ukraine says Zaporizhzhia nuclear power plant has been shut down
A verbal encounter with police at a Black Lives Matter protest led pregnant activist to 4-year prison sentence
description: Lawyers are pushing for a judge to reconsider the prison sentence of a South Carolina activist who was convicted for "breach of peace," aggravated over remarks she made to police during racial justice protests in 2020.

title: Massive 7.6 earthquake rocks Papua New Guinea
description: A massive 7.6 earthquake struck Papua New Guinea on Sunday, causing landslides, cracking roads and damaging buildings.

title: 'Miracle baby' giraffe born at Columbus Zoo
description: The Columbus Zoo has welcomed a long-legged, endangered new addition: a baby Masai giraffe.

title: TSA's 'cutest canine' retires after almost 10 years of service
description: Just weeks after winning TSA's "cutest canine" competition, the agency's oldest sniffer dog has officially retired.

title: King Charles III pledges rest of his life to monarchy as he is proclaimed King
Hong Kong court sentences speech therapists to 19 months in prison over 'seditious' children's books
description: A Hong Kong court on Saturday sentenced five speech therapists to 19 months in prison over children's books deemed to be seditious, in a case that rights defenders say marks a major blow to free speech amid a tightening of civil liberties in the Chinese territory.

title: How the Queen's soft power has helped keep the United Kingdom together
How the Queen's soft power has helped keep the United Kingdom together
description: • William and Harry seen together for the first time in public since June

title: Australia proclaims King Charles III as head of state
description: Australia formally installed King Charles III -- the first new monarch in 70 years -- as the country's head of state in a ceremony Sunday.

title: William and Harry seen together for first time since June. Here's why it's significant
description: Royal biographer Sally Bedell Smith joins CNN's Fredricka Whitfield to discuss the importance of the unannounced appearance at Windsor Castle of Princes William and Harry, and their wives, Catherine and Meghan.

title: Retired Colonel explains 'cascading effect' impacting Russia's momentum
description: Retired Air Force Col. Cedric Leighton speaks to CNN's Pamela Brown about how the command structures differ between the Ukrainian and Russian forces.

title: This show leads the pack with 25 Emmy nominations
description: CNN's Stephanie Elam breaks down the shows to watch for ahead of the 74th Primetime Emmy Awards show.
